languages.text: {n}В первую встречу на Даргонусе Каллигос Винтерскейл предстал перед вами в куда более выгодном свете — блистательный, собранный, непоколебимый. Сейчас же его волосы спутаны, кровь и грязь покрывают обветренные лицо и руки, а броня потускнела от влажности лесов Кетца Темера. Вместо ослепитыльной улыбки лицо Вольного Торговца омрачает зловещая гримаса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}В первую встречу на Даргонусе Каллигос Винтерскейл предстал перед вами в куда более выгодном свете — блистательный, собранный, непоколебимый. Сейчас же его волосы спутаны, кровь и грязь покрывают обветренные лицо и руки, а броня потускнела от влажности лесов Кетца-аль Хета. Вместо ослепитыльной улыбки лицо Вольного Торговца омрачает зловещая гримаса.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}On your first meeting on Dargonus, Calligos Winterscale appeared before you in a much more favourable light — brilliant, collected, steadfast. Now his hair is tangled, blood and dirt cover both his face and hands, and his armour has been tarnished by the humidity of Quetza Temer's forests. Instead of a dazzling smile, the Rogue Trader's face is darkened by a sinister grimace.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В первую встречу на Даргонусе Каллигос Винтерскейл предстал перед вами в куда более выгодном свете — блистательный, собранный, непоколебимый. Сейчас же его волосы спутаны, кровь и грязь покрывают обветренные лицо и руки, а броня потускнела от влажности лесов Кетца Темера. Вместо ослепитыльной улыбки лицо Вольного Торговца омрачает зловещая гримаса.{/n}

Now his hair is tangled, blood and dirt cover both face and hands, and his armour is faded by the humidity of Quetza Temera's forests. Instead of a dazzling smile, the Rogue Trader's face is darkened by a sinister grimace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}On your first meeting on Dargonus, Calligos Winterscale appeared before you in a much more favourable light — brilliant, collected, steadfast. Now his hair is tangled, blood and dirt cover both his face and hands, and his armour has been tarnished by the humidity of Quetza Temer's forests. Instead of a dazzling smile, the Rogue Trader's face is darkened by a sinister grimace.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Cuando os conocisteis en Dargonus, tu primera impresión de Calligos Winterscale fue mucho más favorable: brillante, sosegado, resuelto. Ahora su cabello está enmarañado, tiene las manos y el rostro cubiertos de sangre y tierra, y su armadura está manchada por la humedad de los bosques de Quetza Temer. En lugar de una sonrisa radiante, la cara del Comerciante Independiente está ensombrecida por una mueca siniestra.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}On your first meeting on Dargonus, Calligos Winterscale appeared before you in a much more favourable light — brilliant, collected, steadfast. Now his hair is tangled, blood and dirt cover both his face and hands, and his armour has been tarnished by the humidity of Quetza Temer's forests. Instead of a dazzling smile, the Rogue Trader's face is darkened by a sinister grimace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando os conocisteis en Dargonus, tu primera impresión de Calligos Winterscale fue más favorable: brillante, sosegado, resuelto. Ahora su cabello está enmarañado, tiene las manos y el rostro cubiertos de sangre y tierra, y su armadura acusa la humedad de los bosques de Quetza Temer. En lugar de una sonrisa radiante, la cara del Comerciante Independiente está ensombrecida por una mueca siniestra.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}你们在达戈努斯第一次见面的时候，卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔看起来比现在更加光鲜。那个时候，他看起来精神矍铄，冷静坚定。但现在，他的头发乱成一团，脸上和手上沾满了鲜血和污垢，盔甲也在格扎尔特默森林潮湿的雾气中褪了色。这位行商浪人的脸上不再挂着灿烂的笑容，取而代之的是邪恶的狞笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}On your first meeting on Dargonus, Calligos Winterscale appeared before you in a much more favourable light — brilliant, collected, steadfast. Now his hair is tangled, blood and dirt cover both his face and hands, and his armour has been tarnished by the humidity of Quetza Temer's forests. Instead of a dazzling smile, the Rogue Trader's face is darkened by a sinister grimace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你们在达戈努斯第一次见面的时候，卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔看起来比现在更加光鲜。那个时候，他看起来精神矍铄，冷静坚定。但现在，他的头发乱成一团，脸上和手上沾满了鲜血和污垢，盔甲也在格扎尔特默森林潮湿的雾气中褪了色。这位行商浪人的脸上不再挂着灿烂的笑容，取而代之的是邪恶的狞笑。{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Lors de votre première rencontre sur Dargonus, Calligos Winterscale vous était apparu sous un jour bien plus favorable : brillant, posé, impeccable. Aujourd'hui, ses cheveux sont en bataille, son visage et ses mains sont couverts de sang et de crasse, et son armure a été ternie par l'humidité des forêts de Quetza Temer. De plus, son sourire étincelant a laissé place à une grimace sinistre qui assombrit son visage.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}On your first meeting on Dargonus, Calligos Winterscale appeared before you in a much more favourable light — brilliant, collected, steadfast. Now his hair is tangled, blood and dirt cover both his face and hands, and his armour has been tarnished by the humidity of Quetza Temer's forests. Instead of a dazzling smile, the Rogue Trader's face is darkened by a sinister grimace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lors de votre première rencontre sur Dargonus, Calligos Winterscale vous est apparu sous un jour plus favorable : brillant, posé, impeccable. Aujourd'hui, ses cheveux sont en bataille, son visage et ses mains sont couverts de sang et de crasse, et son armure a été ternie par l'humidité des forêts de Quetza Temer. De plus, son sourire étincelant a laissé place à une grimace sinistre qui assombrit son visage.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}ダルゴナスで、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールと初めて会ったとき、彼は聡明で、冷静で、断固たる意志とともに、好ましい雰囲気をまとっていた。今は髪がもつれ、血と汚れが顔と手を覆い、鎧はケツァ・テメルの森の湿気で汚れてしまった。まばゆい笑みの代わりに、自由開拓者の顔は不吉な険しい表情で暗くなっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}On your first meeting on Dargonus, Calligos Winterscale appeared before you in a much more favourable light — brilliant, collected, steadfast. Now his hair is tangled, blood and dirt cover both his face and hands, and his armour has been tarnished by the humidity of Quetza Temer's forests. Instead of a dazzling smile, the Rogue Trader's face is darkened by a sinister grimace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ダルゴナスで、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールと初めて会ったとき、彼は聡明で、冷静で、断固たる意志とともに、好ましい雰囲気をまとっていた。今は髪がもつれ、血と汚れが顔と手を覆い、鎧はケツァ・テメルの森の湿気で汚れてしまった。まばゆい笑みの代わりに、自由開拓者の顔は不吉な険しい表情で暗くなっている。{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Bei eurer ersten Begegnung auf Dargonus war Calligos Winterzunder in einem günstigeren Licht vor dir erschienen — brillant, gefasst, unerschütterlich. Nun sind seine Haare zerzaust, Blut und Schmutz bedecken sein Gesicht und seine Hände, und seine Rüstung ist durch die Feuchtigkeit in den Wäldern von Quetza Temer angeschlagen. Statt eines strahlenden Lächelns ist auf dem Gesicht des Freihändlers eine düstere Grimasse zu sehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}On your first meeting on Dargonus, Calligos Winterscale appeared before you in a much more favourable light — brilliant, collected, steadfast. Now his hair is tangled, blood and dirt cover both his face and hands, and his armour has been tarnished by the humidity of Quetza Temer's forests. Instead of a dazzling smile, the Rogue Trader's face is darkened by a sinister grimace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bei eurer ersten Begegnung auf Dargonus war Calligos Winterzunder in einem günstigeren Licht vor dir erschienen — brillant, gefasst, unerschütterlich. Nun sind seine Haare zerzaust, Blut und Schmutz bedecken sein Gesicht und seine Hände, und seine Rüstung ist durch die Feuchtigkeit in den Wäldern von Quetza Temer verblasst. Statt eines strahlenden Lächelns ist auf dem Gesicht des Freihändlers eine düstere Grimasse zu sehen.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Calligos Winterscale'in Dargonus'taki ilk karşılaşmanızda çok daha olumlu bir havası vardı. Göz alıcı, kendine hâkim ve kararlıydı. Şimdiyse saçları karman çorman olmuş, hem yüzünü hem de ellerini kan ve pislik kaplamış, zırhıysa Quetza Temer ormanlarının nemiyle zedelenmiş. Hür Tacir'in uğursuzca buruşturduğu yüzüne baş döndürücü gülümsemesinin yerine bir karanlık çökmüş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}On your first meeting on Dargonus, Calligos Winterscale appeared before you in a much more favourable light — brilliant, collected, steadfast. Now his hair is tangled, blood and dirt cover both his face and hands, and his armour has been tarnished by the humidity of Quetza Temer's forests. Instead of a dazzling smile, the Rogue Trader's face is darkened by a sinister grimace.{/n}
